attributes.action: use his influence worldwide to speed up the eradication of malaria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Malaria kills over 1 million people in Africa every year particularly children under the age of 5. It represents a huge threat to the economies of Africa. 

According to the World Health Organisation, Malaria has been estimated to cost Africa more than $12 billion every year in lost GDP, though it could be controlled for a fraction of that sum. 

Is malaria preventable?
Yes it is. 

Has it ever been eradicated in other countries? 
Yes it has in the United States and in Europe many decades ago. 

Can we do the same in Africa? 
Yes we can if we have the will and the motivation.

Prime Minister, please use your influence worldwide to speed up the eradication of malaria
